casebody.data:
Augustus J. Simmons v. State of Connecticut et al. (9213)

Spallone, Daly and Foti, Js.

Argued January 7 decision released January 22, 1991 Otto P. Witt, for the appellant (plaintiff). Arnold K. Shimelman, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellees (named defendant et al.). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
